alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 4:10PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Collier, northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 410 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dade-Collier Training Airport, or 32 miles east of Chokoloskee, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Cypress National Preserve. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County
